### **About**

This website contains a list of clinical informatics platforms funded by ITCR grants. Clinical platforms are those which work with several clinical data types, such as EMR Text and Clinical Notes. Each resource will have up to three links that navigate towards their main site, their documentation, and a list of their publications.

```{r,echo=FALSE,results='hide',message=FALSE}
#Load DT, dplyr
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(RCurl)
```

```{r,echo=FALSE,results='hide',message=FALSE}
# Load file for Imaging Table
generalData <- read_csv(file = here::here("ictr_table_clinical.csv"))
generalData

# Mutate the tibble to alter three of the columns
generalData %<>%
  mutate(`Link (Hyperlinked Over Name)` = paste0('<a href="',`Link (Hyperlinked Over Name)`,'"',' target="_blank"','<div title="Main Link"> </div> <img src="Hyperlink.png"  height="30"> </img>', "Main Link",'</a>'),
         Documentation = paste0('<a href="',Documentation,'"',' target="_blank"','<div title="Documentation"> </div> <img src="Documentation.png" height="30"> </img>', "Documentation", '</a>'),
         Publications = paste0('<a href="',Publications,'"',' target="_blank"','<div title="Publications"> </div> <img src="Publication.png" height="30"> </img>', "Publications", '</a>'))

# Mutate the tibble to combine all three columns into a general "Platform" column.
generalData %<>%
  mutate(Platform = paste0(Name, ":",'<br></br>', `Link (Hyperlinked Over Name)`,'<br></br>', Documentation,'<br></br>', Publications))

# Shift the location of the "Platform" column. 
generalData %<>%
  relocate(Platform, .after = `Link (Hyperlinked Over Name)`)

# Create a trimmed version of the data by removing the non-consolidated columns. 
trimmedData <- generalData[ -c(1,2,8,10) ]   
trimmedData
```


```{r,echo=FALSE,results='hide',message=FALSE}
# Create a Imaging Table
ICTR_omics <- trimmedData %>%
  DT::datatable(
    style = 'auto',
    width="100%",
    colnames = c('Unique Factor' = 2, 'Types of Data' = 3,
                 'Summary' = 7),
    rownames = FALSE,
    escape = FALSE,
    filter = "top",
    #escape = FALSE,
    extensions = list("Scroller"),
    options = list(autoWidth = TRUE, pageLength = 10, scrollY = TRUE,
                   scrollX = TRUE, scrollCollapse = TRUE, fillContainer = TRUE,
                   order = (list(0, 'asc')),
                   columnDefs = list(list(width = '300px', targets = c(6)),
                                     list(width = '100px', targets = c(3,4)),
                                     list(width = '120px', targets = c(0)),
                                     list(width = '200px', targets = c(2)),
                                     list(width = '200px', targets = "_all")),
                   initComplete = JS(
                     "function(settings, json) {",
                     "$('body').css({'font-family': 'Calibri'});",
                     "$(this.api().table().header()).css({'backgroundColor': '#3f546f'});",
                     "$(this.api().table().header()).css({'color': '#fff'});",
                     "}"))
  )
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
ICTR_omics
```
